title: Dealing With the High Cost of Childcare (Hour 2)
description:
Rachel Cruze & Kristina Ellis discuss:

How to use a large inheritance,

What to do with a high interest mortgage,

Childcare costs,

Paying for medical bills for a fiancėe's family.
